website_summaries.verdict: Offers the best design features of dress boots in a low-top shoe with the comfort of a classic loafer.
pros: Comfortable to wear all day, and fit true to size
Stylish look with nice details on the sides
cons: Shoe may be a bit narrow for some feet
Not enough padding for some people who are on their feet all day

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes , stylish yet comfy. They’re slightly more roomy than expected but I plannned on wearing socks with them anyway. I ordered the 11M . I love Clark’s !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital and was tired of wearing sneakers or clogs. I had a pair of Clarke flip flops that I just loved so thought I'd give these a shot. They are almost as comfy as sneakers! I wore them all day and my feet still felt great at the end of the day. I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: rkmg2003

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish shoe. I'd say they fit a tiny bit large, not quite a half size, but just enough that you can wear a warmer sock.That's what I wanted, a winter shoe for days when there is no snow, but it's still cold out. The heel is not that high, and the rubber sole has some traction and is VERY comfortable. I can walk in these, stand for hours, go dancing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Verita

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable for a full day of working on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet all day and needed cute but comfortable dress shoes for work. I have tried over a dozen shoes and have returned them all. These were the winner! I love the fact that it has a heal and looks very dressy. These have become my go to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Padro

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna be honest... So, I bought the new Von D Shoes.... And they didn't fit, because they weren't a true wide! Uh! I was so upset about it, and then I seen this and thought it was a perfect replacement for what I was looking for, and then some! The toe box is a tad tight, but they're very comfortable, so I think I just need to break them in a little. I think I'm gonna end up living in these shoes, I should have just bought these in the first place, Thank you for having such an amazing, True shoe line!
customer_reviews.author: jayme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. So comfortable yet so stylish ☺. I am editing. Its a good shoe for narrow feet. I loved these shoes but had to return it because it was hurting around my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bird

customer_reviews.title: Classic office witch booties
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work in an office that could match most of my outfits. I don’t feel like I needed to break them in at all. No adjustment period and no pain. Good arch support. I walked 0.9 of a mile home in them today and it was fine!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this confortable shoes and for the priceove it more... Great quality for great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Clark's but sadly...
customer_reviews.text: I love Clark's shoes/boots. With the exception of one pair of mud boots, all the shoes/boots I own are Clark's . What has changed... I think it is having added an awesome comfy insole but NOT having bothered to re-engineer the shoe to raise it the 1/8-1/4 inch to make up the needed additional room the insole takes up... The result, my heel slides up and down way to easily in the back of the shoe while my toes are scrunched in the front :( Please fix this Clark
customer_reviews.author: Evey Sauntering

customer_reviews.title: THESE MUST BE FAKE CLARKS!  NOT ONE BIT OF LEATHER EITHER!
customer_reviews.text: There can be no way these are true Clarks shoes. I've been purchasing Clarks shoes for years. My line of work has me on my feet all 10 hours of my shift each day. As I stated there is NO WAY these are leather and they are extremely uncomfortable. I would send them back but my partner accidently threw the box away, so I guess I'm stuck with these. What a waist! Perhaps I will take them to the Clarks store and have them check it out. If I find that these are fake, I will be contacting everyone in my power to not have this happen to anyone else again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these, not bc of how tight they are, but bc they were damaged by RAINDROPS. I was SO DISAPPOINTED to see that each drop of rain that touched the shoe damaged the finish!!! Two thumbs down!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Squeaking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the shoes the first time I wore them. I just wore for the second time today and every step I take, each shoe makes a loud squeaking noise. They are just as loud on carpet as on tile which means to me it is something inside the shoe making the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Padding is nice, heel and toe but this shoe has NO ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a high heel wearer so take this as is. Padding is nice, heel and toe but this shoe has NO arch support! And I know that’s not a high heel limitation as I had a wonderful wedge in the past that felt great! Full support! So I wear this once a week as it looks nice and isn’t intolerable but wouldn’t recommend for a daily for we flat-regulars.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office and the weekend
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for the office or just going out. They dress up a pair of jeans and look great. They are very comfortable. I've worn them several times since they arrived and they never hurt my feet. The materials are of good quality and the blue color is very nice. Clarks did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Marjo12

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes eat my socks. Unfortunately I couldn't have known this before wearing them, now I cannot return them. I don't know what causes this but it's definitely annoying. Doesn't matter the type of socks I wear, they slouch down quickly and bunch up into the toe of the shoe. Also, I'm not getting the arch support I would expect. I was really hoping for a quality shoe with the favorable ratings but alas I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MyDarlin

customer_reviews.title: The heel is extremely wide inside and slides up and down as one walks, the shoe is also loose.
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally unhappy with these shoes went in to return them UNWORN, only to discover that there was a "return by date" that that I could not find anywhere on the order page, nor had I seen it before ordering the shoes. I had had the shoes about 6 wks, during which time I'd been away on vacation part of the time. I had ordered a second pair at the same time from apparently another supplier, they are accepting that pair UNWORN back. I'm stuck with a pair of shoes I may never be able to wear. I'm most unhappy and will never order from this supplier again!! GRRRRR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to rate this experience as horrible: The shoes arrived late last week and I decided to wear them to work today and when I got to work this morning and put my glasses on I noticed substantial scratching and imperfections in the leather on the right side of the right shoe. I should have inspected the shoes upon receiving them but because of Clark's excellent reputation - I own several pair - I didn't and I'll be returning them today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work for work
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great for dress slacks I'm 5'7 and find that even with my height work slacks require a two inch heel to not drag on the ground. They are comfortable for work on my feet all day. I have a narrow foot so theses fit well but might be tight for others expecting a medium width. Also my heel slides so the foot box is narrow while the heel is wide. They are leather but look like vegan material not like quality leather. 4stars because of how many pairs of shoes I bought looking for the right heel height to avoid hemming my pants. Minus 1 for the odd fit and look of the leather
customer_reviews.author: dragonflydays

customer_reviews.title: Average comfort
customer_reviews.text: I usually like the Clarks brand. The shoes are pretty, but after wearing them for a couple of hours, they just aren't as comfortable as previous pairs.I am not sure why, but they don't feel as padded or something? They aren't uncomfortable like you want to take them off, but they won't be my go to pair for all day walking either. I was hoping for super comfortable, but these are average.
customer_reviews.author: 4kids1angel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and they are very comfortable but the right shoe does not fit right. The left shoe fits perfect but the right shoe is too big! I added a pad and thicker sock but my foot still slips when I walk so I have to return them. I debated this a couple of weeks only wearing them once and decided on principle to return them because shoes can be made correct and the fact that right feet are bigger than left makes this is bizarre.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way off!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of Clark's is at least a half inch shorter than another pair of this brand that I already own. Also runs more narrow (M Width). The leather is extremely stiff & the shoe was not at all comfortable. Cute style, but quality has gone way down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and tried them on immediately. I was so relieved that I finally found what I’ve been looking for. These shoes are very comfortable, fit is perfect (for me). I have wide feet and they’re also chubby. I often have a problem with shoes being tight on the instep. Not the case here, these fit perfect. There’s enough room if socks need to be worn but for me personally, my feet swell a bit so this is wonderful. Working from home I won’t know about arch support until I’ve actually “worn” them at work. If needed I will insert some. Overall I’m extremely satisfied. I’m 5’6” and a plus size gal. I wear 10/wide.
customer_reviews.author: OC_Cali_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a casual, comfortable brown shoe with some style for work, but I was disappointed in this bootie. First, the toe is more rounded than it looks in this picture, and I prefer a square toe. Second, even though I ordered wide width, the shoe is too big. I have purchased other Clark shoes in the past, and needed to go wide, though normally I don't need a wide shoe, and now it's not comfortable to wear. I tried thicker socks, but it didn't help. Last, the material looks too fake and it scuffed right away. Because I wore them three times, I can't return them so I guess I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: RAD Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable; not too granny-like
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the hunt for dress shoes that I can actually wear all day and actually walk around, yet not look like I've just given up on trying to be remotely fashionable. I'm really an 11.5 (which is impossible to find), so I end up ordering a 12. These are just a shade too big (duh), but I fill in the gap with one of those heel cushions and it's fine. I'm not saying they're super trendy, but they are comfortable, and are certainly more fashionable than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: North_meets_South

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, versatile shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 26 year old daughter; unfortunately, she didn’t like them. As a 50+ year old, I think these shoes/shooties are adorable with dress pants or jeans. She wears a larger size shoe than I do, so I am unable to comment on the fit or comfort level. They appear to be very well made, and in my experience Clark’s shoes are of very high quality and I have no reason to think otherwise about this particular pair. Lesson learned: of the 3 pairs of shoes I bought her (she recently started a new job) for Christmas and her birthday (a week after Christmas) she only likes one pair. Next time - gift card! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Robie2

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable🙂
customer_reviews.text: So I am always unsure to order shoes on line. Will they feel weird or too tight? These fit perfectly! I was so surprised and happy. I am on my feet a lot for my job. I wore these and they did great. I forgot to take a back up pair of old broken-in shoes in case these things hurt. To my grateful joy, my feet only hurt the normal amount from standing on concrete for five hours. The color was not as blue as I would have liked but not enough to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Discmagic

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews said that the shoes ran small and to size up. I normally wear a 6.5 so I got a size 7. I intend to wear them with socks and the socks that I tried them on with are fairly thin. They are about a half size too big. They are nice shoes, look like they do in the picture so this is not a negative review. This is just a hint that you may not want to purchase a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kitti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my mother, who wanted a new pair to replace an old similar pair of Clark's booties I bought her years ago, that she has finally worn out. We almost had her old pair resoled because she loved them so much, but I found these and decided to give them a try. She was so excited, and loves them. They are great quality and were comfortable right out of the box. They are leather and will stretch, so order your true size; if they are slightly snug, they will stretch out as you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: IrishEnigma

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Clark boot look and have found them super comfortable in the past. However, this pair is not as comfy as ones I had purchased 3 years ago. Less arch support comfort for me which is a problem. I am wearing custom orthotic inserts and this really helps with comfort level for an all day long wear. You may find them very comfortable if you do not have foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: wallycat

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for very comfortable business-casual shoes that I could walk around all day in and not get sore. Through Prime Wardrobe I ordered this pair and two others. This pair won! You know how typically you need to wear shoes in? Not these ones! They're super comfy right out of the box, I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Klemens

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but way too tight. I already have foot pain - so putting up with shoes that immediately cause pain and hoping for them to stretch - is just too much to bear. I'm hoping to re-home them to a friend since I've already attempted to wear them once. Or I may wait for summer and put them in the sun to warm the leather and then cram my feet into them and hope they will stretch where needed. These are Cinderella's shoes and my feet are built like the icky stepsisters' feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W.

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Clarks shoes about 6 months ago. I have loved them ever since. The shoes are so comfortable. I think they could use a little more variety but I have managed to find several pair that I really like. I go for a walk during my breaks at work and usually have to change into tennis shoes but with the Clarks shoes (even the heels) I can walk without any problems. Walking over 1/2 hour during lunch is a breeze in these very comfortable shoes. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: valerie k

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe in an 8 Wide which is my normal size. The toe area was way too narrow and hurt my foot right away and the shoe was too long. It is a cute shoe and I wish it had fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfortable....
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are true to fit. I wear a size 10 and it seems more and more it is hard to find a 10 that is not too tight or too large, even in Clark shoes. These shoes hit the size mark spot on! They are very comfortable to walk in. I wear them with casual pants and dressy pants and they look great. Also, they are a fantastic price. I love these shoes and would purchase them again. Would love to find them in a different color in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Woodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: I think these are gonna be great shoes, and I'm encouraged by others' positive reviews. However, I ordered two different sizes and definitely found that these fit larger than expected--even with socks. I typically wear a 7.5 but ended up keeping these in a 7. One other minor issue is that I'm surprised how much the shoes are creasing already, even just from trying them on. But overall, the comfort will win out and I'm excited to have a new pair of dress shoes for long work days on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Tight in the toebox.
customer_reviews.text: Tight in the toebox, but worth taking to the shoemaker for stretching. They were still a smidge tight, but they've improved over time. From now on, however, I'll stick to Danskos. Not quite as dark blue as they appear in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: tvgaz

customer_reviews.title: Another Goto
customer_reviews.text: Clark's have been my goto shoe for years and the Emslie Warren shoe did not disappoint. I love the fit and was able to wear them right out of the box (no breaking in). The style compliments both work and casual attire. I love the height of the heel and the slender look. I've probably said this many other times with other Clarks shoes that I bought, but I think "these are my favorite" :)
customer_reviews.author: Jalex

customer_reviews.title: I saw these at JCPenny's but they didn't have my size but I really liked the look
customer_reviews.text: I started having trouble with my left foot for almost a year. I have one pair of Clarks but they are not very attractive appealing. I saw these at JCPenny's but they didn't have my size but I really liked the look. They look nice with dress pants or jeans. I have worn them a few times at work and I spend a lot of my time on my feet, walking and standing. I wear inserts and my foot doesn't slide out of the shoe. I would recommended these to anyone and to specially to those who wear cheap shoes. Our feet deserve comfort and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Same shoes are different width from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes from J C Penney's so much that I ordered the same size and color here. The new ones are way too wide for a human.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: The toe box on this shoe is the perfect size. I've had issues with Clark shoes in the past where the toe box is too small and my toes get squished. This toe box has a little wiggle room for your toes and the sides are not too narrow without making the shoe look huge. The leather quality appears to be very good and the overall shoe appearance is very appealing. If you have to wear orthotics, they will fit, but it's hard to zipper with regular socks.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T

customer_reviews.title: The Zippers will not stay up, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for 2 months and the zippers will NOT stay up, it is very annoying and they are pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Wide shoe more narrow than regular width. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this shoe. I typically wear an 8 to an 8 1/2 wide, but I’ve owned a pair of 8 1/2 m (regular) for a couple years now. It was a little snug in toe box and about 1/2 size too long, but still a comfortable shoe. I was so excited to see they had the same shoe in wide. I ordered an 8 wide and it is even more snug in toe box and longer. Doesn’t make sense! I’m going to try 8 1/2 wide and hope for a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I have always liked Clark shoes, but these are probably the best I've had. Just a little bit tight on the first day, but then broken in and extremely comfortable. I work 10-hour days most of the time and these are like gifts for my feet. I bought them in navy blue, which is difficult to find, and they're very attractive and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Beaky

customer_reviews.title: Not the same fit third time around
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9w and find it difficult to find shoes in my size. When I found this pair it was a perfect match for my feet. This is the 3rd time I have bought these shoes online and this time they do not fit the same plus the cushion pad in the heel of the shoe is not there anymore. My last two add a little cushion on the inside of the shoe where your heel sits.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M

customer_reviews.title: Clark provides another "wear-all-day" comfortable dress shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great Clark shoe that can be dressed up or down! The rubber sole provides all-day comfort, even when standing and running around at work. The side zip allows easy of and off wear...I normally prefer shoes that tie up because others tend to feel too large...these a just a "bit" on the larger side...I imagine most size 6 gals would find them perfect...can always wear a sock instead of knee-highs if needed. I also like how how the top of the shoe fits on the foot, again, especially if you are someone who prefers a tie shoe...can't go wrong with these...look great with straight leg and bootcut pants alike.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: the people reviewing these saying they worked 10 hour shifts and their feet don't hurt must sit a lot! I wore them for 6 hours at the salon and the balls of my feet hurt. I put some gelly soles on top of the regular insoles and they fit much better. The toe box wasn't as wide as I was expecting but the rest of the shoe feels like wide width so they are good. All in all not a bad shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Cotenas

customer_reviews.title: Good fit! Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews of this shoe, I decided to order a size larger than I normally would. I am planning on wearing the shoes with socks, and they weren’t available in my normal size. Also, I wasn’t sure of the toe box. Am I glad I did! These shoes are so comfortable! I wore them right away and they were fine. With some shoes if you purchase a size up, they are pretty big. Not so with these. I was pleasantly surprised. Love Clarks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta56

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet, a high arch and a high instep so finding covered shoes is so difficult for me. I ordered a half size larger than my normal size because I always struggle with these things. This bootie is amazing and perfect! They’re easy to put on, have the perfect amount of room in the toe and middle, and don’t rub anywhere in an odd way. I can’t wait to wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: buns

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable true to size
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8.5 and that's what I bought. Its hard to explain but I will try my best to explain how it fits. I put them on and they feel like they are a bit loose but they dont fall off possibly because of the shape of the shoe on the back of your ankle...that makes it the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. Should have bought them in black.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Greene

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe. I normally wear a 9 1/2 med ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I normally wear a 9 1/2 med width in shoe. For some reason Clarks Med shoes have become quite narrow. I ordered a 91/2 wide in this shoe and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Look Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled to find professional shoes for a long time. I have wide feet, and even shoes categorized as "wide" are generally too pinchy. These ones don't pinch at all. They are a TAD big, but I don't really mind. They have a couple other minor issues: the zipper doesn't tend to stay all the way closed, it often opens up half an inch or so. The heel is already starting to get worn out a little after 5-6 uses. But for the price and how infrequently I'll wear them, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andie Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with a strangely long toe
customer_reviews.text: They are comfort, perfectly wide enough, easy to get in/off. I gave a 4 because the toe is absurdly long. It sticks out a good couple inches past my toes. These are much longer than my other pair of Clark’s. I’m sure I will catch the toe of these quite often. But I’m going to keep them because they are very, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, not for the thick of ankle
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other Clarks I have owned, these are quite stiff. They are comfortable enough to wear for a moderate heel, except they cut into my ankle at the top a bit. I should clarify that I have sort of chunky ankles, (not yet cankles), so if you have larger than normal ones these nay not be your cuppa. Nice looking shoe with dress slacks, would be cute with jeans or dresses if you like that look.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always Comfort & Function with Clarks
customer_reviews.text: The heal is not too high & very stable, Clarks is always such a great fit but this does run a bit large (which only means I can wear a thin knee sock w/the narrow width instead of a nylon knee-high). Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They have just the right amount of heel to give them a bit of a dressy look, but very stable and comfortable. They could use just a little more arch support but that is the only small recommendation I would make with these shoes. They are very well made and very comfortable. I will definitely buy more Clark shoes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PRS

customer_reviews.title: Tight toe but seems to stretch out ok.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look with dress pants! These fit like a glove. Was concerned they might be too tight but I will keep them as they are so nice looking and feel great when I first put them on. Love Clark's narrow classic shoes as they tend to run a little longer than other Clark's lines. Wish they made half sizes after 10.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Zipper slides down
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking and sturdy, but the zipper slips down with minimal walking. They're also quite loose and so feel somewhat unstable--order on the smaller side if you're questioning. The leather has held up well and they're comfortable (other than the part where I have to awkwardly zip them back up regularly.
customer_reviews.author: SandyR

customer_reviews.title: Clarks are the best for support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I pay more because I know they'll wear well, and be the most comfortable pair of shoes. I bought the basic black shoe for work, which is about 6 hours of sitting, and only 2 of walking. These shoes are really comfortable, stylish, and versatile. I think they run a little bit big. But, even with them being a tad loose, they don't scrape my heel or cause me any problems. I will always recommend Clarks shoes if you're willing to pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very cute. Because it has full coverage over the top of the foot and doesn’t have a lot of give in the elastic, it is a very tight fit. I could not wear a sock with this shoe. With a very thin trouser sock I can get it on and almost zip completely. Perhaps upon breaking in the show, I’ll be able to zip completely.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. They are sharp, look really good with my business slacks, or jeans, and they are super comfortable. I needed a pair with a low/medium heel that I could wear with my business-casual attire during game day matches that would look good but would also be comfortable on hard floors. They are a hair too big for me, but that is always a gamble with the small size of my feet as it all depends on the brand. I simply wear thicker socks with these and they are perfect. Worth every penny. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and constantly on my feet. I wore these for the first time yesterday and couldn't believe how great they were! I didn't have to break them in, they were comfortable right off the bat. I put them on at 5:00 in the morning and didn't take them off until 7:30 that night and they still felt great. I have a wide foot, so I ordered the 8 W. They were perfect! I am going to get another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Glover

customer_reviews.title: Good for business and after!
customer_reviews.text: Got these Clark’s for my mom for Christmas. She wanted new booties for work as she had worn out the last ones I got her (different brand) and Clark’s was the first shoe that came to mind since I know she’d be on her feet all day. I have a different model of Clark’s that I wear for work and they are comfy and both shoes form to your foot. She was excited when she tried them on and said they fit nicely, are stylish, and going to work perfectly while she’s going from meeting to meeting and wherever else her job calls her too. They’re also cute to wear out straight from work! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey A.

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: I have these boots for awhile. They work very well. I have a bunion on my left foot and I was able to walk for quite a long time in them before my foot starts to hurt. I think unless the shoes are made from fabric, the friction on the bunion from each step would eventually makes it sore.
customer_reviews.author: 10 O'clock

customer_reviews.title: Not really a W
customer_reviews.text: One of 2 things here, either these are not a wide width or because of the elongated toe area they get narrow quickly. I bought a 1/2 size up, which I don't usually do if there is a W available. These fit like a Medium with and my toes are sort of pressed together at the tip. I was looking to replace my everyday pair, but not with these. I will keep to wear occassionally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Women's Emslie Warren
customer_reviews.text: I have found that Clarks shoes fit me very well. I have had surgery on my right big toe which caused my right foot to be slightly bigger than the left foot. As a result, I must have shoes that have a rounded toe bed and and can be stretched slightly on the right shoe to fit. Clarks shoes allow for that adjustment to be made and then the fit is perfect for both feet. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AND walkable.
customer_reviews.text: I have very difficult-to-fit feet:Long, Narrow at heel, wide at balls of the feet. These shoes are not PERFECT for me, but nothing is. However, they are comfortable and walkable. They fit with only a tiny amount of movement at the heel, which is unheard of for me with shoes that are not absolutely flat and "orthopedic." They are also so sleek and pretty. Perfect for an evening out or trip to the museum. They look much more sophisticated than most shoes that you can actually walk in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kuramoto

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and cute. As I get older my feet get achy and I can no longer wear heeled boots with jeans. However I ordered this shoe and it’s so comfortable and looks like a boot when worn with bootcut jeans. I ordered black and I’m going to order a brown pair too. I’m usually 8 1/2 and sometimes need a wide width. I orderd these in 8 1/2 wide and they are just right with thick socks
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are my only work shoe. I own them in black and brown. The arch is perfect and does not hurt my feet, knees, nor back! I live by these shoes. (These are replacements to the exact same ones ) My old ones I put well over an estimate 2000 miles! They didn’t look or feel like it though! I love - love - love these!
customer_reviews.author: Pineiro Family

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Clarke pair of shoe was first pair of shoes I have ever bought on line. But because of the name, the great reviews, great price.....and super cute shoes....thought I would buy them. The day they arrived I had a class to go to...so wore them. I am a nurse and love Hoka tennis shoes. So I am very picky about the comfort of my shoes. These shoes were fabulous!! I did alot of walking in them the first day....and they were extremely comfortable....and very cute! I would highly recommend buying them. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good fit.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are comfortable shoes. First-world problem: The only thing that I am not a fan of is the way the color of the dark brown leather looks. They look "cheap". I'm hoping that they age well and that as they are broken-in, the plastic-like appearance will diminish.
customer_reviews.author: asongstress

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom and she loved them . She's 70 and found these very comfortable just a bit wide around the toes but when she put on socks they fit perfectly. She asked if other colors were available, she ended up buying the black and blue ones, hope those end up the same as these brown ones.
customer_reviews.author: valentine_eli

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem REALLY comfortable. I don't know yet since mine were too large and had to be returned. I am a true size 8 and ordered an 8.5 as I've often done with my wide feet in mind. These are wide enough without sizing up. Don't size up, your feet will lift out of the shoe. I also love the semi-formal look of them.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Clark's makes great quality shoes and does well in maximizing comfort without sacrificing style. I wear this for work usually with slacks, since I like to wear flats with shorts and it does wonders. I can wear it all day long and my flat feet won't ache from lack of support. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Ladies that have back problems can’t wear any hill this shoe is a 10
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes have back problems so hard to find a heel on shoe that does not cause back pain, but these fit great and able to walk without causing additional back pain Been few days wore them out on 2 more occasions can’t say enough good about them there great!!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: not like most Clark shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Clark shoes so I thought these would replace others that are wearing out. Not true. These are stiff and uncomfortable. no arch support or cushioning from the insole. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I typically have trouble finding a shoe wide enough so I usually order a wide or extra wide. This time I ordered an extra wide and I could have used just the wide. But I'm happy to find a style that I can wear and be comfortable on my feet for hours.
customer_reviews.author: businesswoman

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes!! They are so comfortable and perfect for work or a more dressy casual look. I wear them at least 3 times a week and get compliments all the time. I can stand in them for long periods and my feet feel great. I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fit very well
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best shoes I have ever bought via Amazon. I recently hurt my ankle and I’m having therapy these shoes are SUPER comfortable and well worth every penny. Thank you a million times thank you
customer_reviews.author: Skyblueye

customer_reviews.title: Unusual Fit
customer_reviews.text: I gave these shoes five stars because I really liked the shoes, they just did not fit. I wear a 7.5C in every other pair of Clarks that I own but these were too wide across the heal while being very hard to get on, even with the zipper unzipped. The vamp on this style is high. So all in all, I loved the shoe. They just were made for me so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Clark's came through, as did the vendor. Wonderful quality, no need to break the shoes in - the were comfortable as soon as I took them out of the box. Vendor shipped super fast.
customer_reviews.author: G. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, good for walking
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks good and has a comfortable heel. It does not slip off my narrow heel but also does not crowd my toes or pinch across the instep. Great for standing and walking.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, As Usual!
customer_reviews.text: My shoes arrived yesterday and I was able to wear them right out of the box! They arrived in perfect condition and fit like a glove, as always. I have problem feet, but even if I didn't I would wear Clark's shoes. I've been wearing Clark's for decades and they are comfortable, affordable, and stylish. How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Sadly very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are not non slip the wide it to tight and even left unzipped my feet are killing me. I work in a restaurant and almost fall multiple times a day in these. They are cute and may be fine for an office or mild wear but do not recommend if you have to be on your feet for more than a hour or two
customer_reviews.author: Pete Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Hold on!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes but they apparently did not care for me, wore 3hrs max, turned my ankle in them went down hard on my newly replaced knee on concrete no less hit my shoulder can hardly move it, so needless to say guess I'm stuck with a pair of clarks bootie shoes I can't wear and just hoping no more surgery will be forth coming from all of this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Super shoes - great for walking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I have an average foot and medium width - works great with thin socks for me. Can wear these every day. If you have a thick or wide foot, order wide on this one. This is my first time getting Clark shoes - true they are comfy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had more pairs in different colors! Very comfortable, looks sharp and I get compliments every time I wear them. I’m on my feet off and on all day at work and never feel like I want to take them off to rest my feet. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Fall, but better for Winter. Favorite shoes that I have ever bought. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: marilynn arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these exact pair of shoes for a while that I purchased from another retailer and unfortunately, had to buy a new pair recently due to my feet enlarging and widening postpartum (I went up a size). I got the size 8 in wide and they fit so perfectly and feel just like my old pair!! I work in a hospital and walk a lot and these have never let me down!! So comfy, smooth, and just a wonderful style! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my feet so happy!
customer_reviews.text: I usually have such hard time finding shoes that fit comfortably - i order and return so many pair of shoes before i find something that works. These were love at first fit! I have never ever had new shoes that felt so comfortable right out of the box. They feel like slippers. very soft and cushiony. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MB72

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I do not unzip them; I use a shoehorn and they slip right on! I wear a size 8M and first time wear was with a Tommy Copper light weight sock. Will use trouser socks or knee highs in warmer weather. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: P & J King

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, may want to order larger or wide width
customer_reviews.text: i usually wear a. 7 wide or 7.5 med. I’ve ordered and returned Clarke’s before as I feel they run tight. Knowing this I ordered a 7.5 wide and they fit perfect, I think I can even add an orthotic as the arch support is not quite enough for my liking
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C

customer_reviews.title: Shoes on the run
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for me to find shoes that fit correctly. Depending on the shoes I would wear an 11 wide but a 10 1/2 wide would be perfect if that was an option. I bought this shoe for work. Our office is business casual but these shoes also look great in jeans. They fit nice in the toe area and the width of the shoe. There is a little extra room in the heel area for me that is loose but it is managable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wear 8M order a 8w. Clarks are narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Im gona make this review simple because I know how important it is when your trying to purchase things reading peoples reviews and not getting the answer you need. Well ladies, if you wear a size 8M order a 8W it fits PERFECT! Very sexy shoes now I dont have to worry about clicking and clocking up and down the Isle at work the soles of the shoes are rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable even after a long day on my feet. They are also a lot cuter than what the picture represents. I would definitely recommend these shoes for someone who spends a lot of time on their feet and who’s looking for a stylish/cute pair of shoes. My 23-year-old daughter initially purchased these shoes for her job but I ended up purchasing my own pair simply because I really liked the way that they looked. They are true to size and width. Don’t let the pictures of these shoes shown on Amazon deter you from buying a very cute and incredibly comfortable pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Caraized

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable feel with a professional look!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality and look perfect for the office. Super comfortable fit and great foot support. I'll be buying the other colors too! For that price, you cant find a better deal for the quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly DC

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: The day after I got these shoes I wore them to work. I stand more than I sit for my job and work an average of a 8.5 9.0 hour day. These shoes have been comfortable from the beginning and there wasn't a break in period. I have higher arches so I put my arch supports in them and they have been perfect so far. I hope they last longer than a season unlike previous shoes I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable and cute. I'm very glad I bought them. First night I wore them I was thinking it was going to be a mistake as I was likely to be standing all night, but even brand new they were comfortable, right out if the box, no need to break them in
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Stylish and comfortable, and required no breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for years to find a shoe that fits my feet just right, gives me great support and still looks beautiful on my feet. this shoe fit all those criteria. one of the most comfortable shoes Ive worn in years. would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andrea n.

customer_reviews.title: Classy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of time to break in because I have bunions, which means I typically buy leather shoes that will actually shape to my foot and make allowance for the bunions. I love these shoes....professional for at work daily and dressy enough for after work functions and activities.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Canas

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Emslie Warren
product_meta.description: The emslie warren is an exciting new shoe from the clarks collection. great for work or play, this slip on heel will keep you comfortable with cushion soft technology and an ortholite footbed.
